faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our car rental service.
faq.q1: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
faq.a1: The minimum age is typically 21, but may vary depending on the vehicle type and location.
faq.a2: You will generally need a valid driver's license, a major credit card, and depending on location, potentially an international driving permit or passport.
faq.q3: Can I add an additional driver?
faq.a3: Yes, additional drivers can usually be added to the rental agreement for an extra fee. They must meet the same rental requirements as the primary driver.
